definition: to leave a message/to leave one's comments/message
the first Chinese dialect dictionary, edited by Yang Xiong 揚雄|扬雄[Yang2 Xiong2] in 1st century, containing over 9000 characters

sentences.english: Gates sat through it silently for about an hour.
sentences.chinese: 盖茨坐了约一个小时，自始至终沉默不言。

sentences.english: Do not wait, poll, or block for completion.
sentences.chinese: 不要等待，言周查或者阻碍完成。

sentences.english: First, that they were entrusted with the oracles of God.
sentences.chinese: 第一，是神的谕言信托了他们。

sentences.english: So you may want to spread happiness, through your word.
sentences.chinese: 你也许想传播快乐，通过你的言话。

sentences.english: The better the fit, the more successful you will be.
sentences.chinese: 越符合上述所言，你便做得越成功。

sentences.english: I read everything I can get my hands on, but I like love story the best.
sentences.chinese: 我拿到什么书就看什么书，不过我最喜欢言请小说。

sentences.english: It should also be an outlet for our own unspoken thoughts and our varied moods.
sentences.chinese: 它还是我们对无法言愉的情感和多样的心境的宣泄。

sentences.english: The ‘letter’ has been changed as it is no longer a people's heart and a simple love letter.
sentences.chinese: 大概信不再言心，不再是表白真心的情书了才改的。

sentences.english: Above all were embodied in the economic lexicon of Yu Shi Ming Yan.
sentences.chinese: 这些在《喻世明言》的经济词汇中都有所体现。

sentences.english: In conjunction with the above, you need to keep your weekends as school-free as possible.
sentences.chinese: 如标题所言，过周末时要尽可能地忘记学校。

sentences.english: Eric stated that being single, he could concentrate on developing his career.
sentences.chinese: 孙耀威笑言自由身的好处，可以专心发展事业。

sentences.english: Maidens should (or must) be mild and meek, ft to hear and slow to speak.
sentences.chinese: 少女应温良谦恭，敏于听而慎于言。

sentences.english: If I'd done everything they say I've done, she'd have gouged my eyes out.
sentences.chinese: 如果真如检查官所言，她会把我的眼珠挖出来。

sentences.english: There are large differences on linguistic properties of syntax between Chinese and some Indo-European languages like German.
sentences.chinese: 汉语与德语等印欧语言在句法特性上有很大差别。

sentences.english: Political crisis did not weaken this structure, as Haass says.
sentences.chinese: 正如哈斯所言，政治危机并没有动摇这座建筑。

definition: worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
classical final particle, similar to modern 了[le5]
can be compared to/is the same as
self/oneself/sixth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/sixth in order/letter "F" or Roman "VI" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/hexa
dawn/daybreak/to know/to let sb know/to make explicit
